meanings.definition: A small ulcer in the mouth, often painful
meanings.sent1: The aphtha on my lip made it hard to eat.
meanings.sent2: She had an aphtha on her gum that bothered her.
meanings.sent3: The aphtha decided to show up right before the big family dinner.
meanings.sent4: The aphtha felt like a tiny volcano erupting in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The sharp pain of the aphtha was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A fungal infection of the mouth or throat characterized by white patches
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed him with aphtha in his mouth.
meanings.sent2: Aphtha can be treated with antifungal medication.
meanings.sent3: The aphtha seemed to have a mind of its own, spreading quickly.
meanings.sent4: The white patches of aphtha resembled tiny clouds in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The presence of aphtha was a clear sign of infection.
